text: ye’ādami lijochi hoyi! seyit’ani ābatina inatachihuni ḫāfirete gelachewini līyasayachewi libisochachewini kenesu yegefefachewi sīẖoni kegeneti inidawet’achewi hulu inaniteni āyimokirachihu፡፡ ineho irisu keneserawītu kematayuwachewi sifira yayuwachiḫwalina፡፡ inya seyit’anatini le’inezīya lemayaminuti wedajochi ādirigenali፡፡
